Further Reading

  • British Association for Sexual Health and HIV (BASHH). Available online at www.bashh.org

  • British HIV Association (BHIVA). Available online at www.bhiva.org

  • British Infection Association (BIA). Available online at www.britishinfection.org

  • British Paediatric Allergy Immunology and Infection Group (BPAIIG). Available online at www.bpaiig.org

  • British Society for Antimicrobial Chemotherapy. Available online at www.bsac.org.uk

  • British Thoracic Society. Available online at www.brit-thoracic.org.uk

  • Healthcare Infection Society. Available online at www.his.org.uk

  • Health Protection Agency (HPA). Available online at www.hpa.org.uk

  • HIV Drug Interactions Tool. Available online at www.hiv-druginteractions.org

  • National Institute for Heath and Care Excellence. Available online at www.nice.org.uk

  • Survive Sepsis offers training using a combination of classroom-based and self-directed learning. Available online at www.survivesepsis.org

  • The Surviving Sepsis Campaign (SSC). Available online at www.survivingsepsis.org
